---
# Basic configuration for a blog site
title: "MyBlog"          # Title of the blog
#editor: visual           # Type of editor to use

# Settings related to how blog posts are liste
listing:
  contents: posts        # Specifies what content to list, here it's posts
  sort: "date desc"      # Sorting of the posts, descending by date
  type: default        # Type of listing
  categories: true 

  #table-striped: true     # Whether categories are included in the listing
  #sort-ui: false         # Whether UI elements for sorting are displayed
  #filter-ui: false       # Whether UI elements for filtering are displayed

page-layout: full        # Layout of the page

title-block-banner: true # Whether a title block banner is used
---
